name: Rectal Defender
description:
Rectal Defender

In this twin stick shooter you control Poopy (no need to say more) and you need to defend the exit of the... room. Don't let the enemies escape, otherwise the room will get smaller.
You die if you touch the enemy poop.
Use WASD to move and mouse to aim and shoot. If you have a controller connected, use the left stick to move, right stick to aim and right bumper to shoot.

The game was made by Emil Dannberger, Ferruccio Cinquemani and Johannes Fornaeus for Ludumdare #37
